attributes.action: petition for safety measures such as a zebra crossing to be put in place out side English martyrs Catholic school dee road reading
attributes.additional_details:
Im petitioning to have a zebra crossing installed outside english martyrs Catholic school on dee road reading.  There has been far too many near misses with children and adults nearly being hit by cars simply just trying to get to school.  Action needs to be taken to avoid serious harm coming to ourselves and our children.
A zebra crossing is vital. It works well outside many of schools.
Please support by signing this important petition.
Thank you
